summary: An ordinance relating to, specifying and adopting, a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal light and power plant and system; providing for the installation of transformers in certain substations, for the installation of certain facilities at the Lake Union Steam Plant, for the construction and acquisition of a 26,000 volt tie line between the North and Taylor Avenue substations and the completion of the replacement of overhead wiring with underground wiring as contemplated by Ordinance No. 45058; declaring the estimated cost thereof, etc.
